overview:
Sydney Ifergan, the founder of Scoop SEO, has been one of the earliest players in Online Marketing and SEO, right from the experimental days.

SEO and SMO: Professionalism explains the founder best. He carries with him indispensable skills for Search Engine Optimization and Social Media Optimization.

Best SEO Practices: He is good at planning an SEO-friendly website infrastructure with content planning in multiple languages. With him, you are in to the best SEO practices for your website.

Google Penalization Site Restoration: He has proven skills in cleaning and restoring sites subject to Google penalization. He can skillfully restore the site to ranking, eliminating those factors that lead to penalization.
